title: Create React Query hooks for all endpoints
description: Build a complete set of React Query hooks that wrap the API client. These hooks will provide caching, automatic refetching, loading states, and error handling for all data operations.
acceptance_criteria: useSuite(id) - fetch single suite with cases
useRuns(filters?) - fetch runs with optional filters
useRun(id) - fetch single run with polling for active runs
useTriggerRun() - mutation to start a run
useCancelRun() - mutation to cancel a run
Query key factory exported for cache invalidation
implementation_notes: Add polling for runs with status 'pending' or 'running'
Configure stale times per query type (see design spec)
Use optimistic updates for mutations where appropriate
Handle pagination if API supports it
